text:
Alex Dupont to the television’s story.
To begin, at the end of the  19th  century and the beginning of the 20th century, a few scientists and engineers (alike Alex Dupont ) have changed the future about  mass media for ever The tv has been used by government to diffuse Information and a lot of secret messages to make a kind of controle to their population.
Than, at the becomming of the television. The audience could watch shows and emissions into less than 3 channels. It was been weathly to have it. Manies Famillies had shared these television. Before it was a good relationship because the television was like a social melting pot.
Nowadays, the television is a real tool for campanies based on the ad, for the population to be informed about what’s going on around the world and for the political field, a medium  to  influence, to answer to their expectation. The use has changed : it’s more individualist.
Nevertheless, it’s can become a great danger and a bad thing for the mind of our community.
 According to me, Television is a great innovation but it has quiet limits.
Televison is a mass media very rich to share information, to make fun to their spectators at every age. Take an example : With the cartoon « Dora the explorer », kids who are watching it can learn english vocabulary very early. For an other category, people can be aware of world’s new thanks to journalists. Televison is a huge box of cultural informations to. Directors offer great diversity of program to satisfy public, so  the law of the audimat.
But, television can be an available tool of manipulation. What we are watching at Tv must be analyse and took with tweezers.
We shouldn’t believe in everything and develop our critic mind.
